name: Goat
description: A small, hardy creature with short, coarse fur and curved horns, capable of navigating rocky terrains with ease.
memorable: Known for its stubbornness and charging ability that can knock opponents prone.
goals: Primarily serves as livestock; generally peaceful but can be aggressive during mating season.
relations: Often found in herds with other goats or livestock.
environment: Typically inhabits mountainous regions or farmlands.
strengths: Good at charging attacks and knocking down opponents with its horns.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class make it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Uses a melee Ram attack that deals bludgeoning damage and can deal extra damage if charging.
most_powerful_ability: Charge ability that adds damage and has the potential to knock targets prone.
senses: Has a passive perception score of 10, indicating average awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Has an average athletic skill with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Can eat almost anything, making it excellent livestock
Females are generally more peaceful than aggressive males during mating season
Average physical attributes with a notable ability to charge
Can be useful in rugged environments
test_queries: medium beast that can knock down opponents
animal in farmlands with ram attacks
